deficiencies.deficiencyText: missing.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ar goll.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: insecure.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: yn anniogel.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: missing.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ar goll.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: illegible.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: annarllenadwy.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: not in accordance with the requirements.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ddim yn unol â'r gofynion.

imDescriptionWelsh: Gwregysau Diogelwch a Systemau Atal Atodol

deficiencies.deficiencyText: missing.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ar goll.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: of an incorrect type.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: o fath anghywir.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with excessive corrosion, serious deterioration or a fracture in a load bearing member of the vehicle structure within 30cm of the anchorage (where a seat belt is attached to a seat frame this will apply to all seat mounting points).
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda rhydu gormodol, dirywiad difrifol neu doriad mewn aelod sy'n cynnal llwyth o strwythur y cerbyd o fewn 30cm i'r angorfa (lle mae gwregys diogelwch ynghlwm wrth ffrâm sedd bydd hyn yn berthnasol i bob pwynt gosod sedd).

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with excessive corrosion, serious deterioration or a fracture in a load bearing member of the vehicle structure within 30cm of the anchorage (where a seat belt is attached to a seat frame this will apply to all seat mounting points) and is likely to detach.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda rhydu gormodol, dirywiad difrifol neu doriad mewn aelod sy'n cynnal llwyth o strwythur y cerbyd o fewn 30cm i'r angorfa (lle mae gwregys diogelwch ynghlwm wrth ffrâm sedd bydd hyn yn berthnasol i bob pwynt gosod sedd) ac mae'n debygol o ddatgysylltu.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a seat belt not securely fixed to the seat or to the vehicle structure.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gwregys diogelwch nad yw wedi'i osod yn ddiogel ar y sedd nac ar strwythur y cerbyd.

items.itemDescription: Locking Mechanism, Stalks, Retracting Mechanism and Fittings:
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Mecanwaith Cloi, Coesynnau, Mecanwaith Tynnu'n Ôl a Ffitiadau:

deficiencies.deficiencyText: locking mechanism of a seat belt does not secure or release as intended.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: nid yw mecanwaith cloi gwregys diogelwch yn diogelu nac yn rhyddhau fel y bwriadwyd.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: an attachment or adjustment fitting fractured, badly deteriorated or not operating effectively.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: atodiad neu ffitiad addasiad wedi torri, wedi dirywio'n wael neu ddim yn gweithredu'n effeithiol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: corrosion or deterioration of a flexible stalk likely to lead to failure under load.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: cyrydiad neu ddirywiad coesyn hyblyg sy'n debygol o arwain at fethiant dan lwyth.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: broken flexible stalk strands
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: Edafedd coesynnau hyblyg wedi torri

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a retracting mechanism that does not retract the webbing sufficiently to remove all of the slack from the belt with the locking mechanism fastened and the seat unoccupied.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: mecanwaith tynnu'n ôl nad yw'n tynnu'r webin yn ôl yn ddigonol i dynnu'r holl slac o'r gwregys gyda'r mecanwaith cloi wedi'i gau a'r sedd yn wag.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a cut or damage or fluffing or fraying, which is not sufficient to obstruct correct operation of the belt or which has not clearly weakened the webbing.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: toriad neu ddifrod neu fflwffio neu ffraeo, nad yw'n ddigon i rwystro gweithrediad cywir y gwregys neu nad yw wedi gwanhau'r webin yn amlwg.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a cut or damage or fluffing or fraying or overstretching sufficient to obstruct correct operation of the belt or significantly weaken the webbing.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: toriad neu ddifrod neu fflwffio neu ffraeo neu or-ymestyn digon i rwystro gweithrediad cywir y gwregys neu wanhau'r webin yn sylweddol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: stitching badly frayed, insecure, incomplete or repaired.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: pwytho wedi ffraeo'n wael, yn ansicr, yn anghyflawn neu wedi'i atgyweirio.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: so dirty that it is likely to soil passengers’ clothing.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: mor fudr fel ei fod yn debygol o faeddu dillad teithwyr.

items.itemDescription: Obvious signs of structural weakness in a Seat belt; fitting, guide,stalk or pivot
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Arwyddion amlwg o wendid strwythurol mewn Gwregys diogelwch; ffitiad, canllaw, coesyn neu golyn

deficiencies.deficiencyText: such that failure is likely.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: fel bod methiant yn debygol.

items.itemDescription: Seats with seat belts attached to them:
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Seddi gyda gwregysau diogelwch ynghlwm wrthynt:

deficiencies.deficiencyText: insecure.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: yn anniogel.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with a cracked or fractured leg or frame.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda choes neu ffrâm wedi cracio neu wedi torri.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: load limiter or pretensioner obviously missing where fitted as original equipment.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: cyfyngwr llwyth neu ragfynegydd yn amlwg ar goll lle y gosodwyd fel offer gwreiddiol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: pretensioner or a ‘folded type’ webbing load limiter obviously deployed.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: mae'n amlwg bod rhagfynegydd neu gyfyngwr llwyth gwe 'math wedi'i blygu' yn cael ei ddefnyddio.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: missing.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ar goll.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: deployed or disconnected.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: cael ei ddefnyddio neu ei ddatgysylltu.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: indicates any kind of failure of the system.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: yn dynodi unrhyw fath o fethiant y system.

items.itemDescription: Installation defect found during annual test:
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Diffyg gosod a ganfuwyd yn ystod y prawf blynyddol:

deficiencies.deficiencyText: any obvious installation defect found during the inspection.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: unrhyw ddiffyg gosod amlwg a ganfuwyd yn ystod yr arolygiad.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: evidence that original webbing has been cut and/or reworked (e.g. belts knotted, fraying or fluffing removed/sealed by burning etc.).
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: tystiolaeth bod webin gwreiddiol wedi’i dorri a/neu ei ail-weithio (e.e. gwregysau wedi’u clymu, rhwbio neu fflwffio wedi’u tynnu/selio trwy losgi ac ati).

deficiencies.deficiencyText: any part of the installation which has a sharp edge which could or is likely to cut or abrade the webbing.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: unrhyw ran o'r gosodiad sydd ag ymyl siarp a allai neu sy'n debygol o dorri neu sgrafellu'r webin.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a directly attached anchorage not secured by standard seat belt mounting bolts and washers as detailed in paragraph D.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: angorfa sydd wedi’i chysylltu’n uniongyrchol nad yw wedi’i ddiogelu gan folltau gosod gwregysau diogelwch safonol a wasieri fel y nodir ym mharagraff D.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: an anchorage insecure.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: angorfa ansicr.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a tubular seat frame that has been drilled for the purpose of attaching a seat belt.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ffrâm sedd tiwbaidd sydd wedi'i drilio at ddiben gosod gwregys diogelwch.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a directly attached anchorage not attached to a load bearing member or without suitable reinforcement.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: angorfa sydd wedi'i chysylltu'n uniongyrchol nad yw ynghlwm wrth aelod sy'n cynnal llwyth neu heb atgyfnerthiad addas.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: retro-fitted three point belt which is not mounted on a suitable structure.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gwregys tri phwynt wedi'i ôl-osod nad yw wedi'i osod ar strwythur addas.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: tubular frame legs or tubular “H” pattern legs which have not been reinforced with buttressing and diagonal bracing, or buttressing where a floor mounted belt is fitted close to a seat leg.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: coesau ffrâm tiwbaidd neu goesau patrwm “H” tiwbaidd nad ydynt wedi'u hatgyfnerthu â bwtres a ffreision croeslin, neu fwtres lle mae gwregys wedi'i osod ar y llawr wedi'i osod yn agos at goes sedd.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: belt fitted to a seat which has not been suitably reinforced or modified.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gwregys wedi'i osod ar sedd nad yw wedi'i hatgyfnerthu neu ei haddasu'n addas.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: without suitable padding as detailed in paragraph L.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: heb padin addas fel y manylir ym mharagraff L.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: lower anchorages less than 320 mm apart.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: angorfeydd is llai na 320 mm oddi wrth ei gilydd.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: in such a position that loading the belt causes the cushion to be raised or significantly compressed thus allowing the occupant to effectively move forward.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: mewn sefyllfa fel bod llwytho'r gwregys yn achosi i'r clustog gael ei godi neu ei gywasgu'n sylweddol gan ganiatáu i'r deiliad symud ymlaen yn effeithiol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: an anchorage attached to the floor without reinforcement plates of a suitable size and contour.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: angorfa ynghlwm wrth y llawr heb blatiau atgyfnerthu o faint a chyfuchlin addas.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with load spreading washer(s) missing from anchorage bolt.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda wasier(i) taenu llwyth ar goll o'r bollt angori.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: claw type seat mounting with inadequate means of securing claw.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: mowntin sedd math crafanc gyda dull annigonol o sicrhau crafanc.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: on a seat fitted to a flat rail the bolt does not pass through the leg, rail, floor and a suitable structural member or the floor has not been suitably reinforced.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ar sedd sydd wedi'i osod ar reilen wastad nid yw'r bollt yn mynd drwy'r goes, rheilen, llawr ac aelod strwythurol addas neu nid yw'r llawr wedi'i atgyfnerthu'n addas.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: tracking for securing seats and wheelchairs insecure.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: tracio ar gyfer sicrhau seddi a chadeiriau olwyn yn ansicr.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: free movement for a looped belt more than 25mm at the anchorage.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: symudiad rhydd ar gyfer gwregys dolennog mwy na 25mm wrth yr angorfa.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: upper anchorage of three point belt less than 475 mm above uncompressed seat cushion measured parallel to the seat back.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: angorfa uchaf o wregys tri phwynt llai na 475 mm uwchben clustog sedd anghywasgedig wedi'i fesur yn gyfochrog â'r sedd yn ôl.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: upper anchorage of three point belt(s) less than 110 mm from centre line of seat.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: angorfa uchaf gwregys(au) tri phwynt llai na 110 mm o linell ganol y sedd.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: incorrect positioning of a lap belt or lap section of a three point belt. i.e. the belt lies across the stomach or forward of the top quarter of the thigh.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: lleoliad anghywir gwregys glin neu adran lin gwregys tri phwynt. h.y. mae’r gwregys yn gorwedd ar draws y stumog neu flaen chwarter uchaf y glun.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a seat belt component fitted to a seat significantly intrudes into a gangway and is likely to cause injury to a passenger.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: mae elfen gwregys diogelwch sydd wedi'i osod ar sedd yn ymwthio'n sylweddol i'r groesffordd ac yn debygol o achosi anaf i deithiwr.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: for vehicles subject to enhanced seat belt requirements no evidence that seat belt anchorages are likely to meet the strength requirements of EC directive 76/115/EC as amended by directive 96/38/EC.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ar gyfer cerbydau sy'n destun gofynion gwregysau diogelwch uwch dim tystiolaeth bod angorfeydd gwregysau diogelwch yn debygol o fodloni gofynion cryfder cyfarwyddeb 76/115/EC y CE fel y diwygiwyd gan gyfarwyddeb 96/38/EC.

items.itemDescription: Compression Ignition Engines Statutory Visual Test:
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Prawf Gweledol Statudol Peiriannau Tanio Cywasgu:

deficiencies.deficiencyText: After a maximum of six accelerations the exhaust emits smoke of a level greater than that of equivalent metered levels.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: Ar ôl uchafswm o chwe chyflymiad mae'r ecsôst yn allyrru mwg o lefel uwch na'r lefelau cyfatebol â mesurydd.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: The exhaust emits excessive smoke or vapour, of any colour, to an extent likely to obscure vision.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: Mae'r piben wacáu yn allyrru gormod o fwg neu anwedd, o unrhyw liw, i raddau sy'n debygol o guddio golwg.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: After a maximum of six accelerations, the exhaust emits smoke of a level greater than that of equivalent metered levels.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: Ar ôl uchafswm o chwe chyflymiad mae'r ecsôst yn allyrru mwg o lefel uwch na'r lefelau cyfatebol â mesurydd.

items.itemDescription: Emission control equipment fitted by the manufacturer
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Offer rheoli allyriadau a osodwyd gan y gwneuthurwr

deficiencies.deficiencyText: absent, or obviously defective or shows any signs of obvious tampering.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: absennol, neu'n amlwg yn ddiffygiol neu'n dangos unrhyw arwyddion o ymyrryd amlwg.

items.itemDescription: A vehicle equipped with a Diesel Particulate Filter
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Cerbyd sydd â Hidlydd Gronynnol Diesel

deficiencies.deficiencyText: shows any visible signs of smoke.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: yn dangos unrhyw arwyddion amlwg o fwg.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: inoperative or indicating a malfunction.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: anweithredol neu'n dynodi camweithio.

items.itemDescription: Compression Ignition Engines Statutory Smoke Meter Test:
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Prawf Mesurydd Mwg Statudol Peiriannau Tanio Cywasgu:

deficiencies.deficiencyText: After a total of six accelerations have been completed, the average smoke opacity recorded for accelerations 4, 5 and 6 is more than: For vehicles first used before 1 July 2008: The level specified on the manufacturer’s plate or 2.5m-1 for non-turbocharged engines, where the plate value is not available.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: Ar ôl cwblhau cyfanswm o chwe chyflymiad, mae'r didreiddedd mwg cyfartalog a gofnodwyd ar gyfer cyflymiadau 4, 5 a 6 yn fwy na: Ar gyfer cerbydau a ddefnyddiwyd gyntaf cyn 1 Gorffennaf 2008: Y lefel a nodir ar blât y gwneuthurwr neu 2.5m-1 ar gyfer cerbydau nad ydynt yn injans llawn potensial, lle nad yw'r gwerth plât ar gael.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: After a total of six accelerations have been completed, the average smoke opacity recorded for accelerations 4, 5 and 6 is more than: For vehicles first used before 1 July 2008: The level specified on the manufacturer’s plate or 3.0m-1  for turbocharged engines, where the plate value is not available.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: Ar ôl cwblhau cyfanswm o chwe chyflymiad, mae'r didreiddedd mwg cyfartalog a gofnodwyd ar gyfer cyflymiadau 4, 5 a 6 yn fwy na: Ar gyfer cerbydau a ddefnyddiwyd gyntaf cyn 1 Gorffennaf 2008: Y lefel a nodir ar blât y gwneuthurwr neu 3.0m-1 ar gyfer injans llawn potensial, lle nad yw'r gwerth plât ar gael.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: After a total of six accelerations have been completed, the average smoke opacity recorded for accelerations 4, 5 and 6 is more than: For vehicles first used from 1 July 2008: The level specified on the manufacturer’s plate or 1.5m-1 for all CI engines, where the plate value is not available.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: Ar ôl cwblhau cyfanswm o chwe chyflymiad, mae'r didreiddedd mwg cyfartalog a gofnodwyd ar gyfer cyflymiadau 4, 5 a 6 yn fwy na: Ar gyfer cerbydau a ddefnyddiwyd gyntaf o 1 Gorffennaf 2008: Y lefel a nodir ar blât y gwneuthurwr neu 1.5m-1 ar gyfer pob injans CI, lle nad yw'r gwerth plât ar gael.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: After a total of six accelerations have been completed, the average smoke opacity recorded for accelerations 4, 5 and 6 is more than: For vehicles first used from 1 January 2014: The level specified on the manufacturer’s plate or 0.7m-1 for all CI engines, where the plate value is not available.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: Ar ôl cwblhau cyfanswm o chwe chyflymiad, mae'r didreiddedd mwg cyfartalog a gofnodwyd ar gyfer cyflymiadau 4, 5 a 6 yn fwy na: Ar gyfer cerbydau a ddefnyddiwyd gyntaf o 1 Ionawr 2014: Y lefel a nodir ar blât y gwneuthurwr neu 0.7m-1 ar gyfer pob CI injans, lle nad yw'r gwerth plât ar gael.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: The exhaust emits excessive smoke or vapour of any colour, to an extent likely to obscure vision.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: Mae'r piben wacáu yn allyrru gormod o fwg neu anwedd o unrhyw liw, i raddau sy'n debygol o guddio golwg.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: The engine is idling at a speed clearly above the normal idling speed.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: Mae'r injan yn segura ar gyflymder sy'n amlwg yn uwch na'r cyflymder segura arferol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: The exhaust emits dense blue or clearly visible black smoke for a continuous period of 5 seconds at idling speed.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: Mae'r gwacáu yn allyrru mwg glas trwchus neu fwg du sy'n amlwg yn weladwy am gyfnod parhaus o 5 eiliad ar gyflymder segur.

items.itemDescription: Spark Ignition Engines Exhaust Gas Analyser Check:
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Gwiriad Dadansoddwr Nwy Gwactod Peiriannau Tanio Gwreichionen:

deficiencies.deficiencyText: HC content greater than: 1200ppm for a vehicle first used from 1 August 1975 to 1 August 1994.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: Cynnwys HC yn fwy na: 1200ppm ar gyfer cerbyd a ddefnyddiwyd gyntaf rhwng 1 Awst 1975 a 1 Awst 1994.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: HC content greater than: 200ppm for a vehicle first used from 1 August 1994.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: Cynnwys HC yn fwy na: 200ppm ar gyfer cerbyd a ddefnyddiwyd gyntaf o 1 Awst 1994.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: CO content greater than: 4.5% for a vehicle first used from 1 August 1975 to 31 July 1986.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: Cynnwys CO yn fwy na: 4.5% ar gyfer cerbyd a ddefnyddiwyd gyntaf rhwng 1 Awst 1975 a 31 Gorffennaf 1986.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: CO content greater than: 3.5% for a vehicle first used from 1 August 1986 to 1 August 1994 and any LPG/CNG fuelled vehicles used from 1 August 1975.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: Cynnwys CO yn fwy na: 3.5% ar gyfer cerbyd a ddefnyddiwyd gyntaf rhwng 1 Awst 1986 ac 1 Awst 1994 ac unrhyw gerbydau tanwydd LPG/CNG a ddefnyddiwyd o 1 Awst 1975.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: CO content greater than: 0.2% at fast idle (2500 - 3000 rpm) for a vehicle first used from 1 August 1994
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: Cynnwys CO yn fwy na: 0.2% yn gyflym segur (2500 - 3000 rpm) ar gyfer cerbyd a ddefnyddiwyd gyntaf o 1 Awst 1994

deficiencies.deficiencyText: CO content greater than: 0.3% at idle (450  - 1500 rpm) for a vehicle first used from 1 August 1994
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: Cynnwys CO yn fwy na: 0.3% yn segur (450 - 1500 rpm) ar gyfer cerbyd a ddefnyddiwyd gyntaf o 1 Awst 1994

deficiencies.deficiencyText: Lambda not between: 0.97 and 1.03 for a vehicle first used from 1 August 1994
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: Lambda ddim rhwng: 0.97 a 1.03 ar gyfer cerbyd a ddefnyddiwyd gyntaf o 1 Awst 1994

items.itemDescription: Emission control equipment fitted by the manufacturer
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Offer rheoli allyriadau a osodwyd gan y gwneuthurwr

deficiencies.deficiencyText: absent, or obviously defective or shows any signs of obvious tampering.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: absennol, neu'n amlwg yn ddiffygiol neu'n dangos unrhyw arwyddion o ymyrryd amlwg.

items.itemDescription: A vehicle equipped with a Diesel Particulate Filter
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Cerbyd sydd â Hidlydd Gronynnol Diesel

deficiencies.deficiencyText: shows any visible signs of smoke.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: yn dangos unrhyw arwyddion amlwg o fwg.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: inoperative or indicating a malfunction.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: anweithredol neu'n dynodi camweithio.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: fractured or not properly fitted such that detachment is likely.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: wedi torri neu heb ei ffitio'n iawn fel bod datgysylltiad yn debygol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: butting causing the flange to lift more than 1.5mm from the rim and/or not properly fitted.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: bytio yn achosi i'r fflans godi mwy na 1.5mm o'r ymyl a/neu heb ei osod yn iawn.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with any visible elongation of a stud hole.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gydag unrhyw ehangiad gweladwy o dwll styden.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with any visible elongation of a stud hole where secure fixing of a wheel is affected.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gydag unrhyw ehangiad gweladwy o dwll styden lle effeithir ar osod olwyn yn ddiogel.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: badly damaged or distorted (including damaged by the corners of a wheel nut cutting into the material of the wheel).
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: difrodi neu ystumio'n ddrwg (gan gynnwys difrodi gan gorneli nytiau olwyn yn torri i mewn i ddeunydd yr olwyn).

deficiencies.deficiencyText: badly damaged or distorted (including damaged by the corners of a wheel nut cutting into the material of the wheel) where secure fixing of the wheel is affected.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: difrodi neu ystumio'n ddrwg (gan gynnwys difrodi gan gorneli nytiau olwyn yn torri i mewn i ddeunydd yr olwyn) lle effeithir ar osod yr olwyn yn ddiogel.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: not compatible with its fixings.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ddim yn gydnaws â'i osodiadau.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: cracked (except at the bridge over the valve), weld breaking away or an inadequate repair.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: wedi cracio (ac eithrio wrth y bont dros y falf), weldiad yn torri i ffwrdd neu atgyweiriad annigonol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: made of aluminium alloy repaired by welding.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: wedi'i wneud o aloi alwminiwm wedi'i atgyweirio gan weldio.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with a load rating less than that required to support the maximum permissible (GB) axle load.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda sgôr llwyth yn llai na'r hyn sydd ei angen i gynnal y llwyth echel mwyaf a ganiateir (GB).

deficiencies.deficiencyText: cracked, badly damaged, or with a half shaft or wheel flange bolt, stud or nut loose or missing.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: cracio, difrodi'n ddrwg, neu â bollt hanner siafft neu gantel olwyn, hoelen neu nyten yn rhydd neu ar goll.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: cracked, badly damaged, or with half shaft or wheel flange bolts, studs or nuts loose or missing where secure fixing of the wheel is affected.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: wedi cracio, wedi'i ddifrodi'n ddrwg, neu â bolltau hanner siafft neu gantel olwyn, hoelion neu nytiau yn rhydd neu ar goll pan effeithir ar osod yr olwyn yn ddiogel.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with clearance between a spigot mounted wheel and the hub spigots that exceeds 3mm across the diameter.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda chliriad rhwng olwyn wedi'i osod ar sbigot a'r hyb sbigots sy'n fwy na 3mm ar draws y diamedr.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with a wheel retaining nut or stud missing or loose or obviously not fulfilling the function of clamping the wheel to the hub.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gydag olwyn yn cadw cneuen neu gre ar goll neu'n rhydd neu'n amlwg ddim yn cyflawni swyddogaeth clampio'r olwyn i'r hyb.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with multiple wheel retaining nuts or studs missing or loose or obviously not fulfilling the function of clamping the wheel to the hub.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda chneuen neu greoedd cadw olwyn lluosog ar goll neu'n rhydd neu'n amlwg ddim yn cyflawni swyddogaeth clampio'r olwyn i'r hyb.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with a spigot wheel nut washer cracked.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda golchwr cnau olwyn sbigot wedi cracio.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with a wheel locating spigot or dowel missing.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gydag olwyn yn lleoli sbigot neu hoelbren ar goll.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: of which the nominal size, ply rating, load index or speed rating of any tyre is below that appropriate for the plated axle weight.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: y mae maint nominal, graddiad haen, mynegai llwyth neu gyfradd cyflymder unrhyw deiar yn is na'r hyn sy'n briodol ar gyfer pwysau'r echel blatiau.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: of which the nominal size, ply rating, load index or speed rating of any tyre is below that appropriate for the plated axle weight and is loaded in excess of the tyre load index/ply rating.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: y mae maint nominal, graddiad haen, mynegai llwyth neu gyfradd cyflymder unrhyw deiar yn is na'r hyn sy'n briodol ar gyfer pwysau'r echel blatiog ac wedi'i lwytho'n uwch na mynegai llwyth y teiars/graddfa haenellu.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: which has a tyre use marking inappropriate for the type of axle or vehicle to which it is fitted.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: sydd â marc defnydd teiar sy'n amhriodol ar gyfer y math o echel neu gerbyd y mae wedi'i osod arno.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: of a different nominal size to another on the same axle.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: o faint enwol gwahanol i un arall ar yr un echel.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: of a different structure to another on the same axle.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: o strwythur gwahanol i un arall ar yr un echel.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: on a steerable axle which is not of the same structure as any other tyre on any steerable axle
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ar echel y gellir ei lywio nad yw o'r un strwythur ag unrhyw deiar arall ar unrhyw echel y gellir ei lywio

deficiencies.deficiencyText: on a driven axle which is not of the same structure as any other tyre on any driven axle.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ar echel wedi'i yrru nad yw o'r un strwythur ag unrhyw deiar arall ar unrhyw echel a yrrir.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: of which the nominal size, ply rating, load index or speed rating of any tyre is below that appropriate for the axle weight.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: y mae maint nominal, graddiad haen, mynegai llwyth neu gyfradd cyflymder unrhyw deiar yn is na'r hyn sy'n briodol ar gyfer pwysau'r echel.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: of which the nominal size, ply rating, load index or speed rating of any tyre is below that appropriate for the axle weight and is loaded in excess of the tyre load index/ply rating.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: y mae maint nominal, graddiad haen, mynegai llwyth neu gyfradd cyflymder unrhyw deiar yn is na'r hyn sy'n briodol ar gyfer pwysau'r echel ac wedi'i lwytho'n uwch na mynegai llwyth y teiars/graddfa haenellu.

items.itemDescription: A Tyre: On a two axle motor vehicle fitted with single tyres on both axles
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Teiars: Ar gerbyd modur dwy echel sydd â theiars sengl ar y ddwy echel

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a combination of tyres with structures which are not shown as acceptable in the table.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: cyfuniad o deiars gyda strwythurau nad ydynt yn cael eu dangos yn dderbyniol yn y tabl.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with a cut which is deep enough to reach the ply or cords, and is more than 25mm long, or 10% of the section width, whichever is greater.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda thoriad sy'n ddigon dwfn i gyrraedd y plyg neu'r cortynnau, ac sy'n fwy na 25mm o hyd, neu 10% o led yr adran, pa bynnag sydd fwyaf.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with a lump, bulge or tear caused by separation or partial failure of its structure, including any lifting of the tread rubber.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda lwmp, chwydd neu rwyg a achosir gan wahaniad neu fethiant rhannol yn ei strwythur, gan gynnwys unrhyw godiad o'r rwber gwadn.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with exposed ply or cord.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda plyg neu linyn agored.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: rubbing on any part of the vehicle.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: rhwbio ar unrhyw ran o'r cerbyd.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: fouling on any part of the vehicle and safe driving not impaired.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: baeddu ar unrhyw ran o'r cerbyd a gyrru diogel heb ei amharu.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: fouling on any part of the vehicle and safe driving is impaired.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: baeddu ar unrhyw ran o'r cerbyd ac amhariad ar yrru'n ddiogel.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: incorrectly seated on its wheel.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: eistedd yn anghywir ar ei olwyn.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: obviously underinflated.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: yn amlwg wedi'i danchwythu.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: where the base of any groove of the original tread pattern is not clearly visible.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: lle nad yw gwaelod unrhyw rigol o'r patrwm gwadn gwreiddiol i'w weld yn glir.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: where the minimum tread depth and tread band requirements are not met.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: lle na fodlonir y dyfnder gwadn lleiaf a'r gofynion band gwadn.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: in excess of ten years of age fitted to any front steered axle of a vehicle.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: dros ddeng mlwydd oed wedi'i osod ar unrhyw echel flaen cerbyd.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with a date of manufacture code illegible or not displayed on any axle (excluding a front steered axle).
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda chod dyddiad gweithgynhyrchu yn annarllenadwy neu heb ei arddangos ar unrhyw echel (ac eithrio echel flaen llywio).

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with a date of manufacture code illegible or not displayed to any front steered axle of a vehicle.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda chod dyddiad gweithgynhyrchu yn annarllenadwy neu heb ei arddangos ar unrhyw echel flaen y cerbyd.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: in excess of ten years of age fitted to the front steered axle or any axle on a minibus with a single wheel fitment.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: dros ddeng mlwydd oed wedi'i ffitio ar yr echel flaen y llyw neu unrhyw echel ar fws mini gyda ffitiad olwyn sengl.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with a date of manufacture code illegible or not displayed (excluding a front steered axle or any axle on a minibus with single wheel fitment).
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda chod dyddiad gweithgynhyrchu yn annarllenadwy neu heb ei arddangos (ac eithrio echel flaen llywio neu unrhyw echel ar fws mini gyda ffitiad olwyn sengl).

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with a date of manufacture code illegible or not displayed to any front steered axle or any axle on a minibus with single wheel fitment.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda chod dyddiad gweithgynhyrchu yn annarllenadwy neu heb ei arddangos ar unrhyw echel flaen llywio neu unrhyw echel ar fws mini gyda ffitiad olwyn sengl.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: fitted to a vehicle which should not have one.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: wedi'i osod ar gerbyd na ddylai fod ag un.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: on which the wholly or partly recut tread pattern is not to the manufacturer’s recut tread pattern.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: lle nad yw’r patrwm gwadn wedi'i aildorri yn gyfan gwbl neu’n rhannol yn cyfateb i batrwm gwadn aildoriad y gwneuthurwr.

items.itemDescription: A bumper bar or bracket which is:

deficiencies.deficiencyText: insecure.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: yn anniogel.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: insecure to the extent that detachment is imminent.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: yn ansicr i'r graddau y mae datgysylltiad ar fin digwydd.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: has a jagged or projecting edge likely to cause injury.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ag ymyl miniog neu bargodol sy'n debygol o achosi anaf.

imDescription: Sideguards, Rear Under-Run Devices & Bumper Bars
imDescriptionWelsh: Gardiau ochr, Dyfeisiau Tan-Red yn y Cefn a Bariau Bymper

items.itemDescription: A bumper bar or bracket which is:

deficiencies.deficiencyText: insecure.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: yn anniogel.

deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: yn ansicr i'r graddau y mae datgysylltiad ar fin digwydd.

deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ag ymyl miniog neu bargodol sy'n debygol o achosi anaf.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: to a vehicle required to have them fitted.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: i gerbyd sydd ei angen i'w gosod.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: insecure.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: yn anniogel.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: insecure to the extent that detachment is imminent.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: yn ansicr i'r graddau y mae datgysylltiad ar fin digwydd.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: cracked, fractured, corroded or damaged so that its effectiveness is reduced.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: wedi cracio, torri asgwrn, wedi cyrydu neu wedi'i ddifrodi fel bod ei effeithiolrwydd yn cael ei leihau.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with exposed surfaces which are not smooth (e.g. projecting brackets, jagged edges, bolt heads that are not dome shaped).
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gydag arwynebau agored nad ydynt yn llyfn (e.e. cromfachau ymestynnol, ymylon miniog, pennau bolltau nad ydynt ar ffurf cromen).

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with external corners or edges that are sharp.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda chorneli allanol neu ymylon miniog.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with incorrect dimensions.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda dimensiynau anghywir.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: that is not continuous along the vehicle length in other than accepted circumstances.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: nad yw'n barhaus ar hyd hyd y cerbyd ac eithrio amgylchiadau a dderbynnir.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: that increases the overall width of the vehicle.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: sy'n cynyddu lled cyffredinol y cerbyd.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with more than 550mm height from the ground to the lowest edge of the guard. (vehicle unladen or semi-trailer load platform horizontal).
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda mwy na 550mm o uchder o'r ddaear i ymyl isaf y gard. (llwyfan llwyth heb ei lwytho cerbyd neu lled-ôl-gerbyd llorweddol).

deficiencies.deficiencyText: not fitted to a vehicle required to have one fitted.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: heb ei osod ar gerbyd mae angen gosod un.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: insecure.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: yn anniogel.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: insecure to the extent that detachment is imminent.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: yn ansicr i'r graddau y mae datgysylltiad ar fin digwydd.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: cracked, fractured, corroded or damaged so that its effectiveness is reduced.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: wedi cracio, torri asgwrn, wedi cyrydu neu wedi'i ddifrodi fel bod ei effeithiolrwydd yn cael ei leihau.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: that has a jagged edge.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: sydd ag ymyl miniog.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with more than 550mm ground clearance (unladen).
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda mwy na 550mm o gliriad tir (heb lwyth).

deficiencies.deficiencyText: which extends beyond the outer edge of the outermost rear tyre (see note in procedure and standards).
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: sy'n ymestyn y tu hwnt i ymyl allanol y teiar cefn mwyaf allanol (gweler y nodyn yn y weithdrefn a'r safonau).

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with the outer end of the device more than 100mm inboard of the outer edge of the outermost rear tyre (or more than 300mm inboard where a demountable body is fitted).
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda phen allanol y dyfais yn fwy na 100mm i mewn i ymyl allanol y teiar cefn mwyaf allanol (neu fwy na 300mm i mewn i fwrdd lle mae corff symudadwy wedi'i osod).

deficiencies.deficiencyText: extends beyond the outermost width of the vehicle which is fitted with a tail lift.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: yn ymestyn y tu hwnt i led allanol y cerbyd sydd â lifft ôl.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: incomplete.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: anghyflawn.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: insecure, damaged or incorrectly positioned but not so that it is likely to fall from the vehicle.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: yn ansicr, wedi'i ddifrodi neu wedi'i leoli'n anghywir ond nid fel bod y naill na'r llall yn debygol o ddisgyn o'r cerbyd.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: so insecure or positioned that it is likely to fall from the vehicle.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: mor anniogel neu mewn safle fel ei fod yn debygol o ddisgyn o'r cerbyd.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: so insecure or positioned that it is likely to fall from the vehicle or cause damage to the electrical wiring, other vehicle components or passenger luggage, or is likely to injure occupants.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: mor anniogel neu mewn safle fel ei fod yn debygol o ddisgyn o'r cerbyd neu achosi difrod i'r gwifrau trydanol, cydrannau eraill y cerbyd neu fagiau teithwyr, neu'n debygol o anafu preswylwyr.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: not in proper condition.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ddim mewn cyflwr priodol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: insecure, damaged or incorrectly positioned but not so that either is likely to fall from the vehicle.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: yn ansicr, wedi'i ddifrodi neu wedi'i leoli'n anghywir ond nid fel bod y naill na'r llall yn debygol o ddisgyn o'r cerbyd.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: so insecure, damaged or positioned that it is likely to fall from the vehicle.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: mor anniogel, wedi'i ddifrodi neu mewn safle fel ei fod yn debygol o ddisgyn o'r cerbyd.

items.itemDescription: A drawing hitch, bar, hook, eye, ball or ball socket; or a fifth wheel king pin and its mounting or a turntable which:
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Bachyn tynnu, bar, bachyn, llygad, pêl neu soced pêl; neu bin pumed olwyn a'i fowntio neu fwrdd tro sydd:

deficiencies.deficiencyText: is excessively worn.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: wedi cael ei dreulio'n ormodol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: is excessively worn with obvious risk of detachment
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: wedi cael ei dreulio'n ormodol gyda risg amlwg o ddatgysylltu

deficiencies.deficiencyText: is seriously deformed or modified impairing its effectiveness and or weakens the component (no trailer attached).
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: wedi cael ei ddadffurfio'n ddifrifol neu wedi'i addasu gan amharu ar ei effeithiolrwydd a neu'n gwanhau'r gydran (dim trelar ynghlwm).

deficiencies.deficiencyText: is seriously deformed or modified impairing its effectiveness and or weakens the component (trailer attached).
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: wedi cael ei ddadffurfio'n ddifrifol neu wedi'i addasu gan amharu ar ei effeithiolrwydd a neu'n gwanhau'r gydran (trelar ynghlwm).

deficiencies.deficiencyText: is cracked or fractured (no trailer attached).
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: wedi cracio neu wedi torri (dim trelar ynghlwm).

deficiencies.deficiencyText: is cracked or fractured (trailer attached).
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: wedi cracio neu wedi torri (trelar ynghlwm).

deficiencies.deficiencyText: is insecure.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: yn anniogel

deficiencies.deficiencyText: is insecure to such an extent that detachment is likely.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: yn ansicr i'r fath raddau fel bod datgysylltiad yn debygol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: has excessive movement between the vehicle and trailer.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: mae ganddo symudiad gormodol rhwng y cerbyd a'r trelar.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: has a turntable which has no clearance between mating surfaces, i.e. evidence of contact between the surfaces.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: â bwrdd tro nad oes ganddo unrhyw gliriad rhwng arwynebau paru, h.y. tystiolaeth o gyswllt rhwng yr arwynebau.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: has a missing, damaged, seized and or inadequate safety or locking device or any coupling indicator inoperative.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: yn meddu ar ddyfais diogelwch neu gloi ar goll, wedi'i difrodi, wedi'i hatafaelu a/neu'n annigonol neu unrhyw ddangosydd cyplu yn anweithredol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: has a coupling too weak.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: mae ganddo gyplydd yn rhy wan.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: insecurity between the fifth wheel and its mounting subframe and or chassis.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ansicrwydd rhwng y bumed olwyn a'i is-ffrâm mowntio a/neu siasi.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: insecurity between the fifth wheel and its mounting subframe and or chassis to such an extent that detachment is likely.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ansicrwydd rhwng y bumed olwyn a'i is-ffrâm mowntio a/neu siasi i'r fath raddau fel bod datgysylltiad yn debygol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a mandatory bolt loose or missing.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: bollt gorfodol yn rhydd neu ar goll.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: mandatory bolts loose or missing to such an extent that detachment is likely.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: bolltau gorfodol yn rhydd neu ar goll i'r fath raddau fel bod datodiad yn debygol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: jaws excessively worn or out of adjustment.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: genau wedi treulio'n ormodol neu allan o addasiad.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: jaws so worn or out of adjustment that the trailer kingpin would not be securely held.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: safnau sydd wedi treulio cymaint neu allan o addasiad na fyddai kingpin y trelar yn cael ei gadw'n ddiogel.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a safety locking device is missing or inoperative.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: dyfais cloi diogelwch ar goll neu'n anweithredol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: an articulating bracket or pivot excessively worn or insecure.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: braced cymalog neu golyn wedi treulio'n ormodol neu'n ansefydlog.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: an articulating bracket or pivot excessively worn or insecure to such an extent that detachment is likely.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: braced cymalog neu golyn wedi treulio'n ormodol neu'n ansefydlog i'r fath raddau fel bod datgysylltiad yn debygol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: any crack in a load bearing member.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: unrhyw grac mewn aelod sy'n cario llwyth.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: an operating member insecure or worn to such an extent the coupling is unsafe.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: aelod gweithredol yn ansicr neu wedi treulio i'r fath raddau y cyplydd yn anniogel.
