items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Paneli corff, aelodau ffrâm, ffitiadau neu gydrannau:

deficiencies.deficiencyText: insecure, fractured or cracked, distorted, worn, corroded, damaged or modified, to such an extent it is likely to cause injury.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: yn ansefydlog, wedi torri neu wedi cracio, wedi ystumio, wedi treulio, wedi cyrydu, wedi'i ddifrodi neu wedi'i addasu, i'r fath raddau ei fod yn debygol o achosi anaf.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: insecure, fractured or cracked, distorted, worn, corroded, damaged or modified to such an extent the vehicle is obviously dangerous to other road users, passengers or pedestrians.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: bod y cerbyd yn anniogel, wedi torri neu wedi cracio, wedi ystumio, wedi treulio, wedi cyrydu, wedi ei ddifrodi neu wedi ei addasu i’r fath raddau, yn amlwg yn beryglus i ddefnyddwyr eraill y ffordd, teithwyr neu gerddwyr.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with an inappropriate modification of the bodywork.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gydag addasiad amhriodol o'r corff.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with an unsafe modification of the bodywork which has seriously weakened the component.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gydag addasiad anniogel o'r corff sydd wedi gwanhau'r gydran yn ddifrifol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: structure defective allowing contents to protrude or fall onto a road, or in a condition to damage or soil luggage.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: strwythur diffygiol sy'n caniatáu i'r cynnwys ymwthio allan neu ddisgyn ar ffordd, neu mewn cyflwr i ddifrodi neu bridd bagiau.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: access doors likely to become detached.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: drysau mynediad yn debygol o ddod yn ddatgysylltiedig.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: access doors with a sliding action which will not remain closed or is likely to fly open inadvertently.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: drysau mynediad gyda gweithred llithro na fydd yn aros ar gau neu sy'n debygol o hedfan ar agor yn anfwriadol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: access doors with a hinged action which will not remain closed or is likely to fly open inadvertently.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: drysau mynediad gyda gweithred colfachog na fydd yn aros ar gau neu sy'n debygol o hedfan ar agor yn anfwriadol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: which when secured in the open position obscures a position lamp, direction indicator or rear retro reflector.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: sydd, o'i sicrhau yn y safle agored, yn cuddio lamp safle, dangosydd cyfeiriad neu adlewyrchydd retro cefn.

imDescription: Interior of Body, Passenger Entrances, Exit Steps and Platforms
imDescriptionWelsh: Tu Mewn i'r Corff, Mynedfeydd Teithwyr, Grisiau Gadael a Llwyfannau

deficiencies.deficiencyText: access to any exit obstructed.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: mynediad i unrhyw allanfa wedi'i rwystro.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: steps and stairways, retractable steps, gangways, platforms or floor traps: in a deteriorated condition.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: grisiau, grisiau y gellir eu tynnu'n ôl, tramwyfeydd, llwyfannau neu drapiau llawr: mewn cyflwr gwaeth.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: steps and stairways, retractable steps, gangways, platforms or floor traps: damaged or insecure but unlikely to collapse in normal use.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: grisiau, grisiau y gellir eu tynnu'n ôl, tramwyfeydd, llwyfannau neu drapiau llawr: wedi'u difrodi neu'n ansicr ond yn annhebygol o gwympo mewn defnydd arferol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: steps and stairways, retractable steps, gangways, platforms or floor traps: so damaged or insecure or in such a condition that they are likely to collapse in normal use.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: grisiau, grisiau y gellir eu tynnu'n ôl, tramwyfeydd, llwyfannau neu drapiau llawr: wedi'u difrodi neu'n ansicr neu mewn cyflwr o'r fath fel eu bod yn debygol o ddymchwel mewn defnydd arferol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a floor trap locking device worn or ineffective so that the trap may become displaced.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: dyfais cloi trap llawr wedi treulio neu'n aneffeithiol er mwyn i'r trap gael ei ddadleoli.

items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Camau y gellir eu tynnu'n ôl gyda:

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a step which will not retract or remain retracted.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: cam na fydd yn tynnu'n ôl nac yn parhau i gael ei dynnu'n ôl.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a step which will not operate or operates incorrectly.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: cam na fydd yn gweithredu neu'n gweithredu'n anghywir.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: driver able to move vehicle without being aware that the step is in the down position e.g. direct sight or mirror or warning device or interlock.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyrrwr yn gallu symud cerbyd heb fod yn ymwybodol bod y cam yn y safle i lawr e.e. golwg uniongyrchol neu ddrych neu ddyfais rhybuddio neu gyd-gloi.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: driver able to move vehicle without being given an audible warning when a manually operated step is not fully retracted on Bus Directive and ECE regulation vehicles.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyrrwr yn gallu symud cerbyd heb gael rhybudd clywadwy pan nad yw cam a weithredir â llaw yn cael ei dynnu'n ôl yn llawn ar Cyfarwyddeb Bws a cherbydau rheoleiddio ECE.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: driver able to move vehicle when a power operated step is in the down position on Bus Directive and ECE regulation vehicles, without an effective safety device to prevent the power operated steps from operating with the vehicle in motion.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyrrwr sy'n gallu symud cerbyd pan fod cam a weithredir â phŵer yn y sefyllfa i lawr ar Cyfarwyddeb Bws a cherbydau rheoleiddio ECE, heb ddyfais ddiogelwch effeithiol i atal y camau pŵer rhag gweithredu gyda'r cerbyd yn symud.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a step insecure.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: cam ansefydlog.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: non-slip material defective.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: deunydd gwrthlithro yn ddiffygiol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: insecure, damaged or weakened so that the damaged seat structure or covering could endanger passengers or damage their clothing.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: yn ansefydlog, wedi'i ddifrodi neu wedi'i wanhau fel y gallai strwythur neu orchudd y sedd sydd wedi'i ddifrodi beryglu teithwyr neu ddifrodi eu dillad.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: layout which has been changed without approval and which could endanger passengers.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: cynllun sydd wedi'i newid heb gymeradwyaeth ac a allai beryglu teithwyr.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with covering(s) in such a condition that they are likely to soil passengers clothing.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda gorchudd(ion) yn y fath gyflwr fel eu bod yn debygol o faeddu dillad teithwyr.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: number reduced from the approved number.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: nifer wedi gostwng o'r nifer cymeradwy.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: number increased from the approved number.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: nifer wedi cynyddu o'r nifer cymeradwy.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: which encroach into gangways or exits and do not automatically retract when not in use.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: sy'n tresmasu ar gangiau neu allanfeydd ac nad ydynt yn tynnu'n ôl yn awtomatig pan nad ydynt yn cael eu defnyddio.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: without a legible notice saying “for crew use only” or similar on or adjacent to the seat or not identified as for crew use on a Bus Directive and ECE regulation vehicle.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: heb hysbysiad darllenadwy yn dweud “at ddefnydd criw yn unig” neu debyg ar y sedd neu gerllaw iddi neu heb ei nodi fel ar gyfer defnydd criw ar Cyfarwyddeb Bws a cherbyd rheoleiddio ECE.

items.itemDescription: Grab rails, straps, stanchions, guard rails and barriers
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Cydio rheiliau, strapiau, stanchions, rheiliau amddiffyn a rhwystrau

deficiencies.deficiencyText: missing, insecure and not likely to endanger passengers.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ar goll, yn ansefydlog ac ddim yn debygol o beryglu teithwyr.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: so insecure and in such a condition they are likely to endanger passengers.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: mor ansefydlog ac yn y fath gyflwr y maent yn debygol o beryglu teithwyr.

items.itemDescription: Parcel racks in such a condition
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Rheseli parseli yn y fath gyflwr

deficiencies.deficiencyText: that allows articles to fall onto the driver or passengers.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: sy'n caniatáu i eitemau ddisgyn ar y gyrrwr neu'r teithwyr.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: forced ventilation equipment ineffective. (not Schedule 6 minibuses.)
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: offer awyru gorfodol yn aneffeithiol. (nid bysiau mini Atodlen 6.)

deficiencies.deficiencyText: any ventilator, opening windows or roof hatches insecure.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: unrhyw awyriadur, agor ffenestri neu agoriadau to yn ansefydlog.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: more than 50% of the ventilator system (i.e. opening windows, ventilators and roof hatches) inoperative where forced air ventilation is not available.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: mwy na 50% o’r system awyru (h.y. agor ffenestri, awyriaduron a llinellau to) yn anweithredol lle nad oes system awyru gorfodol ar gael.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: missing, contaminated to a degree which constitutes a fire risk, or which allows fumes to penetrate passenger saloon.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ar goll, wedi'i halogi i raddau sy'n gyfystyr â risg tân, neu sy'n caniatáu i fygdarth dreiddio i salŵn teithwyr.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: inadequate illumination of saloon interior, steps, platform, staircase and other facilities (interior lights only apply to steps for Schedule 6 minibuses).
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: goleuo annigonol o du mewn y salŵn, grisiau, platfform, grisiau a chyfleusterau eraill (dim ond i risiau ar gyfer bysiau mini Atodlen 6 y mae goleuadau mewnol yn berthnasol).

deficiencies.deficiencyText: completely inoperative lamp(s) for illumination of saloon interior, steps, platform, staircase and other facilities (interior lights only apply to steps for Schedule 6 minibuses).
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: lamp(iau) cwbl anweithredol ar gyfer goleuo tu fewn y salŵn, grisiau, platfform, grisiau a chyfleusterau eraill (dim ond i risiau ar gyfer bysiau mini Atodlen 6 y mae goleuadau mewnol yn berthnasol).

deficiencies.deficiencyText: missing or inoperative.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ar goll neu'n anweithredol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: does not give a visual indication to passengers that the bus is stopping on Bus Directive and ECE regulation vehicles which carry standing passengers.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: nad yw'n rhoi arwydd gweledol i deithwyr bod y bws yn stopio ar gerbydau'r Gyfarwyddeb Bysiau a cherbydau rheoleiddio ECE sy'n cludo teithwyr sy'n sefyll.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: insecure or damaged so that it is likely to cause injury to passengers.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: yn ansefydlog neu wedi'i ddifrodi fel ei fod yn debygol o achosi anaf i deithwyr.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: contaminated so that they are likely to soil passengers clothing.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: wedi'u halogi fel eu bod yn debygol o faeddu dillad teithwyr.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: missing, inaccessible or in poor or contaminated condition.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ar goll, yn anhygyrch neu mewn cyflwr gwael neu halogedig.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: receptacle not marked.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: cynhwysydd heb ei farcio.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: missing, inaccessible, discharged, incorrect type or in an obviously poor condition.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ar goll, yn anhygyrch, wedi'i ryddhau, math anghywir neu mewn cyflwr amlwg wael.

items.itemDescription: Any “other facility” (including those listed in 15-19 below) which is
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Unrhyw “gyfleuster arall” (gan gynnwys y rhai a restrir yn 15-19 isod) sydd

deficiencies.deficiencyText: incomplete, insecure and/or incorrect function and is likely to endanger passengers.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: swyddogaeth anghyflawn, ansefydlog a/neu anghywir ac yn debygol o beryglu teithwyr.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: the strength of the lift or ramp is significantly impaired.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: mae cryfder y lifft neu'r ramp yn cael ei amharu'n sylweddol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: there are sharp edges or other protrusions on a lift or ramp which are likely to cause injury.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: os oes ymylon miniog neu allwthiadau eraill ar lifft neu ramp sy'n debygol o achosi anaf.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: defective in operation and not likely to injure passengers, pedestrians or other road users.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: diffygiol yn ei weithrediad a ddim yn debygol o anafu teithwyr, cerddwyr neu ddefnyddwyr eraill y ffordd.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: defective in operation to the extent that it is likely to injure passengers, pedestrians or other road users.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: diffygiol yn ei weithrediad a ddim yn debygol o anafu teithwyr, cerddwyr neu ddefnyddwyr eraill y ffordd.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: non-slip surface on ramp defective.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: arwyneb gwrthlithro ar y ramp yn ddiffygiol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: non-slip surface on ramp defective to such an extent that it is likely to cause injuries.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: arwyneb gwrthlithro ar ramp yn ddiffygiol i'r fath raddau fel ei fod yn debygol o achosi anafiadau.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a lift or ramp which cannot be secured in stored position.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: lifft neu ramp na ellir ei glymu yn ei le storio.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: any wheelchair floor fitting loose or likely to cause passengers to trip.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: unrhyw osodiadau llawr cadair olwyn yn rhydd neu'n debygol o achosi teithwyr i faglu.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: any padded backrest missing (when known to be an original fitting), insecure or in a condition which is likely to cause injury to passengers.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: unrhyw gynhalydd cefn padio ar goll (pan wybod ei fod yn ffitiad gwreiddiol), yn ansefydlog neu mewn cyflwr sy'n debygol o achosi anaf i deithwyr.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: any stanchion, retractable rail/movable device, partition or panel relating to the wheelchair area missing, insecure or in a condition which is likely to cause injury to passengers.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: unrhyw stansiwn, rheilen ôl-dynadwy/dyfais symudol, pared neu banel sy'n ymwneud â'r ardal gadair olwyn sydd ar goll, yn anniogel neu mewn cyflwr sy'n debygol o achosi anaf i deithwyr.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with fuel filler inside vehicle
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda llenwr tanwydd y tu mewn i'r cerbyd

deficiencies.deficiencyText: in such a condition that they are likely to endanger passengers.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: yn y fath gyflwr fel eu bod yn debygol o beryglu teithwyr.

items.itemDescription: Television/video for passenger entertainment with the screen placed
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Teledu/fideo ar gyfer adloniant i deithwyr gyda'r sgrin wedi'i osod

deficiencies.deficiencyText: where driver can view whilst driving.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: lle gall gyrrwr weld wrth yrru.

items.itemDescription: Part of any required close proximity, front mirror or camera for an indirect visual device
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Rhan o unrhyw agosrwydd, drych blaen neu gamera gofynnol ar gyfer dyfais weledol anuniongyrchol

deficiencies.deficiencyText: is fitted less than 2 metres from the ground.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: wedi'i osod llai na 2 fetr o'r ddaear.

items.itemDescription: A required mirror or indirect vision device
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Drych gofynnol neu ddyfais golwg anuniongyrchol

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with minor damage that does not obviously interfere with the view to the rear or nearside or front where required of anyone sitting in the driving seats.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda mân ddifrod nad yw'n amlwg yn ymyrryd â'r olygfa i'r cefn neu'r ochr agosaf neu'r blaen lle bod angen gan unrhyw un sy'n eistedd yn y seddi gyrru.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: in such a condition that anyone sitting in the driving seat cannot see clearly towards the rear or nearside or front where required.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: mewn cyflwr o'r fath fel na all unrhyw un sy'n eistedd yn y sedd yrru weld yn glir tuag at y cefn neu'r ochr agosaf neu'r tu blaen lle bod angen.

items.itemDescription: A mirror/indirect vision device or its mounting bracket
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Drych/dyfais golwg anuniongyrchol neu ei fraced mowntio

deficiencies.deficiencyText: insecure or structurally deteriorated.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ansefydlog neu wedi dirywio yn strwythurol.

items.itemDescription: Not fitted with the correct number or type(s)
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Heb ei ffitio â'r rhif neu fath(au) cywir

deficiencies.deficiencyText: of mirror, or other indirect vision device.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: o ddrych, neu ddyfais golwg anuniongyrchol arall.

items.itemDescription: A required mirror or indirect vision device
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Drych gofynnol neu ddyfais golwg anuniongyrchol

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with minor damage that does not obviously interfere with the view to the rear or nearside of anyone sitting in the driving seats.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda mân ddifrod nad yw'n amlwg yn amharu ar olygfa y tu ôl neu'r ochr agosaf i unrhyw un sy'n eistedd yn y seddi gyrru.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: in such a condition that anyone sitting in the driving seat cannot see clearly towards the rear or nearside.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: mewn cyflwr o'r fath fel na all unrhyw un sy'n eistedd yn y sedd yrru weld yn glir tuag at y cefn neu'r ochr agosaf.

items.itemDescription: A mirror/indirect vision device or its mounting bracket
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Drych/dyfais golwg anuniongyrchol neu ei fraced mowntio

deficiencies.deficiencyText: insecure or structurally deteriorated.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ansefydlog neu wedi dirywio yn strwythurol.

items.itemDescription: A mirror/indirect vision device or periscope

deficiencies.deficiencyText: insecure and in such a condition that it is likely to injure the driver or passengers.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: yn ansefydlog ac yn y fath gyflwr fel ei fod yn debygol o anafu’r gyrrwr neu’r teithwyr.

imDescription: Glass and View of the Road

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with an obstruction, damage or discolouration which materially affects view to the front or the sides through the area of windscreen not swept by the wipers (zone C).
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda rhwystr, difrod neu afliwiad sy'n effeithio'n sylweddol ar olwg y blaen neu'r ochrau trwy ardal y ffenestr flaen nad yw'n cael ei hysgubo gan y sychwyr (parth C).

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with an obstruction, damage or discolouration which materially affects view to the front or the sides through the area of windscreen swept by the wipers.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda rhwystr, difrod neu afliwiad sy'n effeithio'n sylweddol ar olwg y blaen neu'r ochrau trwy ardal y ffenestr flaen sy'n cael ei hysgubo gan y sychwyr.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with a crack in the windscreen outside of the area swept by the wipers (zone C).
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda hollt yn y ffenestr flaen y tu allan i'r ardal wedi'i hysgubo gan y sychwyr (parth C).

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with a crack passing through the swept area which renders the screen insecure or which materially affects view to the front or the sides through the area of windscreen swept by the wipers.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda hollt yn mynd trwy'r ardal sychu sy'n gwneud y sgrin yn anniogel neu sy'n effeithio'n sylweddol ar olwg y blaen neu'r ochrau trwy ardal y ffenestr flaen sy'n cael ei hysgubo gan y sychwyr.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with any crack where there is noticeable displacement of the surfaces on either side which has an adverse effect on the condition and operation of the windscreen wipers.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gydag unrhyw hollt lle mae'r arwynebau'n cael eu dadleoli'n amlwg ar y naill ochr a'r llall sy'n cael effaith andwyol ar gyflwr a gweithrediad y sychwyr sgrin wynt.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with damage which exposes the inner layer of a laminated screen.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda difrod sy'n datgelu haen fewnol sgrin wedi'i lamineiddio.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: so insecure that it is likely to fall out or damaged to the extent that it presents a danger to occupants or to other road users.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: mor ansefydlog fel ei fod yn debygol o gwympo allan neu ei ddifrodi i'r graddau ei fod yn achosi perygl i feddianwyr neu ddefnyddwyr eraill y ffordd.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with damage or obstruction, which impairs the driver’s view of a mandatory mirror.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda difrod neu rwystr, sy'n amharu ar olwg y gyrrwr o ddrych gorfodol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: not made from safety glass or safety glazing as specified.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: heb ei wneud o wydr diogelwch neu wydr diogelwch fel y nodir.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: made of safety glass which does not show an acceptable marking.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: wedi'i wneud o wydr diogelwch nad yw'n dangos marc derbyniol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: in such a condition it would allow water to leak into the passenger areas.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: mewn cyflwr o'r fath byddai'n caniatáu i ddŵr ollwng i'r ardaloedd teithwyr.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: windscreen or outside window missing.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ffenestr flaen neu ffenestr allanol ar goll.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: or internal screen or partition so insecure that it is likely to fall out in normal use or cause injury to any person on the vehicle.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: neu sgrin fewnol neu raniad mor ansicr fel ei fod yn debygol o ddisgyn allan yn y defnydd arferol neu achosi anaf i unrhyw berson ar y cerbyd.

items.itemDescription: A guard rail or barrier at a window, internal screen or partition:
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Rheilen warchod neu rwystr wrth ffenestr, sgrin fewnol neu raniad:

deficiencies.deficiencyText: missing, insecure or damaged to the extent that injury to a passenger is likely.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ar goll, yn ansicr neu wedi'i ddifrodi i'r graddau y mae anaf i deithiwr yn debygol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: any wheelchair restraint components deteriorated, insecure or defective but not likely to affect it's function.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: unrhyw gydrannau ataliad cadair olwyn wedi dirywio, yn ansicr neu'n ddiffygiol ond ddim yn debygol o effeithio ar ei swyddogaeth.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: any wheelchair restraint components missing, or badly deteriorated, insecure and or defective to such an extent the function is obviously affected.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: unrhyw gydrannau ataliad cadair olwyn sydd ar goll, neu wedi dirywio'n wael, yn ansicr a/neu'n ddiffygiol i'r fath raddau bod y swyddogaeth yn amlwg yn cael ei heffeithio

deficiencies.deficiencyText: any wheelchair user restraint components deteriorated, insecure or defective but not likely to affect it's function.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: unrhyw gydrannau ataliad defnyddiwr cadair olwyn wedi dirywio, yn ansicr neu'n ddiffygiol ond ddim yn debygol o effeithio ar ei swyddogaeth.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: any wheelchair user restraint components missing,  or badly deteriorated, insecure and or defective to such an extent the function is obviously affected.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: unrhyw gydrannau ataliad defnyddiwr cadair olwyn sydd ar goll, neu wedi dirywio'n wael, yn ansicr a/neu'n ddiffygiol i'r fath raddau bod y swyddogaeth yn amlwg yn cael ei heffeithio.

items.itemDescription: For each wheelchair space designed for a rearward facing wheelchair:
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Ar gyfer pob gofod cadair olwyn a ddyluniwyd ar gyfer cadair olwyn sy'n wynebu'r cefn:

deficiencies.deficiencyText: any padded backrest missing, insecure or in a condition which is likely to cause injury to passengers.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: unrhyw gynhalydd cefn padio ar goll, yn ansefydlog neu mewn cyflwr sy'n debygol o achosi anaf i deithwyr.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: any stanchion, fixed rail, retractable/movable device, partition or panel relating to the wheelchair area missing, insecure or in a condition which is likely to cause injury to passengers.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: unrhyw stansiwn, rheilen sefydlog, dyfais dynadwy/symudol, pared neu banel sy'n ymwneud â'r ardal gadair olwyn sydd ar goll, yn anniogel neu mewn cyflwr sy'n debygol o achosi anaf i deithwyr.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a lift or ramp missing, insecure or the strength of the lift or ramp is significantly impaired.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: lifft neu ramp ar goll, yn ansicr neu mae cryfder y lifft neu'r ramp yn cael ei amharu'n sylweddol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a lift or ramp which does not function as intended or does not operate through the required range of movement.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: lifft neu ramp nad yw'n gweithio fel y bwriadwyd neu nad yw'n gweithredu drwy'r ystod symudiadau gofynnol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: there are sharp edges or other protrusions on a lift or ramp which are likely to cause injury.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: os oes ymylon miniog neu allwthiadau eraill ar lifft neu ramp sy'n debygol o achosi anaf.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: the band of contrasting colour on a lift or ramp surface edge is missing or has deteriorated to the extent that it is visually ineffective.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: mae'r band o liw cyferbyniol ar ymyl lifft neu wyneb ramp ar goll neu wedi dirywio i'r graddau ei fod yn weledol aneffeithiol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a lift surface does not have an effective device for preventing wheelchairs from rolling off or the device is ineffective.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: nid oes gan arwyneb lifft ddyfais effeithiol ar gyfer atal cadeiriau olwyn rhag rholio i ffwrdd neu mae'r ddyfais yn aneffeithiol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: cannot be stowed, failure or malfunction of any stowage retaining device (including failure to release without power supplied where appropriate) but safety not affected.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ni ellir ei storio, methiant neu gamweithio unrhyw ddyfais cadw storle (gan gynnwys methiant i ryddhau heb gyflenwad pŵer lle ei fod yn briodol) ond ni effeithir ar ddiogelwch.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: cannot be safely stowed, failure or malfunction of any stowage retaining device (including failure to release without power supplied where appropriate) that affects safety.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ni ellir ei storio'n ddiogel, methiant neu gamweithio unrhyw ddyfais cadw storle (gan gynnwys methiant i ryddhau heb gyflenwad pŵer lle ei fod yn briodol) sy'n effeithio ar ddiogelwch.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: the safety device intended to prevent the vehicle being driven normally when the lift or ramp is not in its intended position for vehicle travel, is ineffective.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: mae'r ddyfais ddiogelwch a fwriedir i atal y cerbyd rhag cael ei yrru fel arfer pan nad yw'r lifft neu'r ramp yn y sefyllfa a fwriadwyd ar gyfer teithio mewn cerbyd, yn aneffeithiol.

items.itemDescription: A power operated lift or ramp (additional requirements):
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Lifft neu ramp a weithredir gan bŵer (gofynion ychwanegol):

deficiencies.deficiencyText: defective in operation to the extent that it is likely to injure passengers, pedestrians or other road users.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: diffygiol yn ei weithrediad i'r graddau ei fod yn debygol o anafu teithwyr, cerddwyr neu ddefnyddwyr eraill y ffordd.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with an audible device missing or inoperative. (except an Annex VII done vehicle with a powered lift).
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda dyfais glywadwy ar goll neu'n anweithredol. (ac eithrio cerbyd wedi'i orffen yn Atodiad VII gyda lifft pŵer).

deficiencies.deficiencyText: on an Annex VII vehicle with a powered ramp the yellow warning lights are defective.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ar gerbyd Atodiad VII gyda ramp wedi'i bweru mae'r goleuadau rhybudd melyn yn ddiffygiol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: on an Annex VII vehicle with a powered ramp the yellow warning lights are missing.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ar gerbyd Atodiad VII gyda ramp wedi'i bweru mae'r goleuadau rhybudd melyn ar goll.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: incapable of being operated manually and the vehicle does not have a portable ramp.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: yn analluog i gael ei weithredu â llaw ac nid oes gan y cerbyd ramp cludadwy.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: without an effective safety device to prevent the lift or ramp from operating with the vehicle in motion.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: heb ddyfais ddiogelwch effeithiol i atal y lifft neu ramp rhag weithredu gyda'r cerbyd yn symud.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: safety device to stop the extension or retraction of a ramp or lift on meeting an obstruction inoperative and is likely to cause injury.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: dyfais ddiogelwch i atal estyniad neu dynnu'n ôl y ramp neu'r lifft wrth gwrdd â rhwystr sy'n anweithredol ac sy'n debygol o achosi anaf.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with no suitable storage stowage position and likely to cause injury to any passenger or crew.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: heb safle storio addas ac yn debygol o achosi anaf i unrhyw deithiwr neu griw.

items.itemDescription: Entrance and exit optical device to allow driver to view wheelchair entrances and exits:
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Dyfais optegol mynediad ac allanfa i alluogi gyrrwr i weld mynedfeydd ac allanfeydd cadeiriau olwyn:

deficiencies.deficiencyText: missing or inefective.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ar goll neu'n aneffeithiol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: insecure but unlikely to become detached.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: yn ansefydlog ond yn annhebygol o ddatgysylltiedig.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: insecure to such an extent that detachment is imminent.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ansefydlog i'r fath raddau fel bod datodiad ar fin digwydd.

items.itemDescription: A required sign/marking or safety instruction

deficiencies.deficiencyText: missing or illegible.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ar goll neu'n annarllenadwy.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: any internal wheelchair space communication device missing or inoperative.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: unrhyw ddyfais cyfathrebu ardal cadair olwyn fewnol ar goll neu'n anweithredol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: any external communication device missing or inoperative.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: unrhyw ddyfais cyfathrebu allanol ar goll neu'n anweithredol.

items.itemDescription: Communication devices: Lighting specifically intended for wheelchair users to board or alight in safety
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Dyfeisiau cyfathrebu: Goleuadau a fwriadwyd yn benodol ar gyfer defnyddwyr cadeiriau olwyn i fynd ar neu bant yn ddiogel

deficiencies.deficiencyText: missing, inoperative or deteriorated to the extent that the illumination is significantly reduced.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ar goll, yn anweithredol neu wedi dirywio i'r graddau bod y goleuo'n cael ei leihau'n sylweddol.

items.itemDescription: Floors and gangways slip resistant material
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Lloriau a llwybrau sy'n gwrthsefyll llithro

deficiencies.deficiencyText: deteriorated to the extent that it is no longer effective.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: dirywio i'r graddau nad yw bellach yn effeithiol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: slip resistant material deteriorated to the extent that it is no longer effective.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: deunydd sy'n gwrthsefyll llithro wedi dirywio i'r graddau nad yw bellach yn effeithiol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: band of contrasting colour is missing or deteriorated to the extent that it is no longer visually effective.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: band o liw cyferbyniol ar goll neu wedi dirywio i'r graddau nad yw bellach yn weledol effeithiol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: any interlock and/or safety device applicable to folding, extendable and/or power steps is inoperative.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: unrhyw ddyfais cyd-gloi a/neu ddiogelwch sy'n berthnasol i gamau plygu, estynadwy a/neu bŵer yn anweithredol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: has an operating control, which is inadequately marked.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: â rheolydd gweithredu, nad yw wedi'i farcio'n ddigonol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: has controls which are incapable of stopping and reversing the lowering process.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: â rheolyddion na allant atal a gwrthdroi'r broses ostwng.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: does not have an effective interlock to prevent the vehicle from being driven at speeds in excess of 5km/h with the vehicle lower than normal height.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: heb gyd-gloi effeithiol i atal y cerbyd rhag cael ei yrru ar gyflymder o fwy na 5km/h gyda'r cerbyd yn is na'r uchder arferol.

items.itemDescription: Switch(es) controlling windscreen wipers and/or washers
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Switsys sy'n rheoli sychwyr sgrin wynt a/neu wasieri

deficiencies.deficiencyText: missing or defective.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ar goll neu'n ddiffygiol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: do not move over an adequate area.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ddim yn symud dros ardal ddigonol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: do not work continually when switched on.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ddim yn gweithio'n barhaus pan gaiff ei droi ymlaen.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a blade missing, insecure or so deteriorated that it cannot clear the screen effectively.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: llafn ar goll, yn ansefydlog neu wedi dirywio cymaint fel na all glirio'r sgrin yn effeithiol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: not working or not providing sufficient fluid to clear the windscreen.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ddim yn gweithio neu ddim yn darparu digon o hylif i glirio'r ffenestr flaen.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: not fitted.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: heb ei ffitio.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: incomplete or dial glass broken without affecting the operation.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gwydr anghyflawn neu ddeialu wedi'i dorri heb effeithio ar y weithred.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: incomplete, clearly inoperative, or with dial glass missing or broken and affecting the operation.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: anghyflawn, yn amlwg yn anweithredol, neu gyda gwydr deialu ar goll neu wedi torri ac yn effeithio ar y llawdriniaeth.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: cannot be illuminated.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ni ellir ei oleuo.

items.itemDescription: For all vehicles fitted with a tachograph:
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Ar gyfer pob cerbyd sydd â thacograff:

deficiencies.deficiencyText: tachograph installation/calibration plaque missing  or damaged (where required).
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gosodiad tacograff/plac graddnodi ar goll neu wedi'i ddifrodi (lle bod angen).

deficiencies.deficiencyText: DIL switch cover missing, broken or damaged through interference.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: Gorchudd switsh DIL ar goll, wedi torri neu wedi'i ddifrodi oherwydd ymyrraeth.

items.itemDescription: For vehicles required to be fitted with a tachograph:
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Ar gyfer cerbydau y mae angen gosod tacograff arnynt:

deficiencies.deficiencyText: tachograph scale not marked in kilometres per hour (There is no requirement for tachographs to be marked in m.p.h.).
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: graddfa tacograff heb ei farcio mewn cilometrau yr awr (Nid oes gofyniad i dacograffau gael eu marcio mewn m.p.h.).

deficiencies.deficiencyText: tachograph manufacturer’s serial number/data plaque missing or not showing an “e” marking.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: rhif cyfresol gwneuthurwr tacograff/plac data ar goll neu ddim yn dangos marc “e”.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: tachograph installation/calibration plaque out of date.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gosodiad tacograff/plac graddnodi wedi dyddio.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: where a digital tachograph is fitted the size of drive axle  road tyres do not comply with calibration plaque.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: pan fod tacograff digidol wedi'i osod, nid yw teiars ffordd echel gyrru maint yn cydymffurfio â phlac graddnodi.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: “K” factor plaque missing.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: Plac ffactor “K” ar goll.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: seal missing, broken or where a clearly “non mandatory” seal has been fitted in place of an “official” seal.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: sêl ar goll, wedi torri neu lle mae sêl “anorfodol” amlwg wedi'i gosod yn lle sêl “swyddogol”.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: unable to obtain a printout from a digital tachograph.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: methu cael allbrint o dacograff digidol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a digital tachograph that displays a ‘K’ factor reading different to that shown on the calibration plaque (there is no allowance/tolerance as with analogue type tachographs).
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: tacograff digidol sy’n dangos darlleniad ffactor ‘K’ sy’n wahanol i’r hyn a ddangosir ar y plac graddnodi (nid oes lwfans/goddefgarwch fel gyda thacograffau math analog).

items.itemDescription: For vehicles not required to be fitted with a tachograph, where a tachograph is fitted in place of a speedometer:
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Ar gyfer cerbydau nad oes angen tacograff arnynt, lle gosodir tacograff yn lle cyflymdra:

deficiencies.deficiencyText: If a speed limiter is required (which is sensed from the tachograph head): seal missing, broken or where a clearly “non-mandatory" seal has been fitted in place of an “official" seal.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: Os oes angen cyfyngydd cyflymder (sy'n cael ei synhwyro o'r pen tacograff): sêl ar goll, wedi torri neu lle mae sêl amlwg “anorfodol” wedi'i gosod yn lle sêl “swyddogol”.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: If a speed limiter is not required: a seal (within the tachograph head) missing, broken, or where a clearly “non mandatory” seal has been fitted in place of an “official” seal. There is no requirement for the gearbox sender unit to be sealed.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: Os nad oes angen cyfyngydd cyflymder: sêl (o fewn pen y tacograff) ar goll, wedi torri, neu lle mae sêl “anorfodol” amlwg wedi'i gosod yn lle sêl “swyddogol”. Nid oes unrhyw ofyniad i'r uned anfon blwch gêr gael ei selio.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: missing.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ar goll.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: cannot be reached easily from the driving seat.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ni ellir ei gyrraedd yn hawdd o'r sedd yrru.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: insecure.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: yn anniogel.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: does not work.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ddim yn gweithio.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: is not loud enough to be heard by other road users.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: nad yw'n ddigon uchel i ddefnyddwyr eraill y ffordd ei glywed.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: sound not continuous or uniform.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: sain ddim yn barhaus nac yn unffurf.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: insecure.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: yn anniogel.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: insecure.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: yn anniogel.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: insecure and safe operation of the vehicle obviously affected.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gweithrediad ansefydlog a diogel y cerbyd yn amlwg yr effeithir arnynt.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: incomplete.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: anghyflawn.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: incomplete and safe operation of the vehicle obviously affected.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gweithrediad anghyflawn a diogel y cerbyd yn amlwg yr effeithir arnynt.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: fractured, cracked or excessively corroded.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: wedi torri, cracio neu wedi rhydu'n ormodol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: fractured, cracked or excessively corroded and safe operation of the vehicle obviously affected.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: wedi torri, cracio neu wedi rhydu'n ormodol a gweithrediad diogel y cerbyd yn amlwg wedi'i effeithio.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: obstructed or impeded in its travel.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: wedi ei rwystro neu ei rwystro yn ei deithio.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: obstructed or impeded in its travel and safe operation of the vehicle obviously affected.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: wedi'i rwystro neu ei rwystro o ran teithio a gweithrediad diogel y cerbyd yr effeithir arno yn amlwg.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: obviously not functioning correctly.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: yn amlwg ddim yn gweithredu'n gywir.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: obviously not functioning correctly and safe operation of the vehicle obviously affected.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: yn amlwg ddim yn gweithredu'n gywir a gweithrediad diogel y cerbyd yn amlwg yn cael ei effeithio.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with the presence of rubbish or other items likely to interfere with the proper control of the vehicle.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda phresenoldeb sbwriel neu eitemau eraill sy'n debygol o amharu ar reolaeth briodol y cerbyd.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: clutch pedal anti-slip provision missing, loose, incomplete or ineffective.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: darpariaeth gwrthlithro pedal cydiwr ar goll, yn rhydd, yn anghyflawn neu'n aneffeithiol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: clutch pedal anti-slip provision missing, loose, incomplete or ineffective and safe operation of the vehicle obviously affected.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: darpariaeth gwrthlithro pedal cydiwr ar goll, yn rhydd, yn anghyflawn neu'n aneffeithiol ac yn ddiogel gweithrediad y cerbyd yn amlwg yr effeithir arno.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: missing or inoperative.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ar goll neu'n anweithredol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: couple clamp bolt or locking device missing or loose.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: bollt clamp cwpl neu ddyfais cloi ar goll neu'n rhydd.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with excessive movement of centre of steering wheel in line with the column (end float).
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda symudiad gormodol o ganol y llyw yn unol â'r golofn (fflôt diwedd).

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with excessive side play indicating a badly worn top bearing or insecure top mounting bracket.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda chwarae ochr gormodol yn dynodi dwyn top sydd wedi treulio'n wael neu fraced mowntio top ansefydlog.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: flexible coupling or universal joint insecure, deteriorated or with excessive wear.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: cyplu hyblyg neu gymal cyffredinol yn ansicr, wedi dirywio neu â thraul gormodol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: coupling clamp bolt or locking device missing or loose with a serious risk of separation.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: bollt clamp cyplu neu ddyfais cloi ar goll neu'n rhydd gyda risg difrifol o wahanu.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with an adjustment device worn to such an extent that it would render the column insecure.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda dyfais addasu wedi'i gwisgo i'r fath raddau fel y byddai'n gwneud y golofn yn ansicr.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with an adjustment device worn to such an extent that it would render the column insecure with a serious risk of loss of steering control.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda dyfais addasu wedi'i gwisgo i'r fath raddau fel y byddai'n gwneud y golofn yn ansefydlog gyda risg difrifol o golli rheolaeth llywio.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with an inappropriate modification.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gydag addasiad amhriodol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with an unsafe modification which has seriously weakened the component, does not provide sufficient clearance to other vehicle parts or affects the steering function.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gydag addasiad anniogel sydd wedi gwanhau'r gydran yn ddifrifol, nad yw'n darparu digon o gliriad i rannau eraill y cerbyd nac yn effeithio ar y swyddogaeth llywio.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: insecure.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: yn anniogel.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: insecure to such an extent that detachment is likely.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ansicr i'r fath raddau fel bod datgysylltiad yn debygol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: hub, spoke or rim fractured or cracked.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: canolbwynt, adain neu ymyl wedi torri neu wedi cracio.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: hub, spoke or rim fractured or cracked to such an extent that detachment is likely.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: canolbwynt, adain neu ymyl wedi torri neu wedi cracio i'r fath raddau fel bod datgysylltiad yn debygol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: cover torn with jagged edges likely to injure the driver.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gorchudd wedi'i rwygo ag ymylon miniog sy'n debygol o anafu'r gyrrwr.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: hub retaining device not fitted or loose.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: dyfais cadw canolbwynt heb ei ffitio neu'n rhydd.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: hub retaining device not fitted or loose and detachment is likely.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: dyfais cadw canolbwynt heb ei ffitio neu'n rhydd ac mae datgysylltiad yn debygol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: locking mechanism not functioning correctly.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: mecanwaith cloi ddim yn gweithio'n gywir.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: locking mechanism not functioning correctly and affects safe steering operation.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: mecanwaith cloi ddim yn gweithio'n gywir ac yn effeithio ar weithrediad llywio diogel.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: which is outside the prescribed limits.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: sydd y tu allan i'r terfynau rhagnodedig.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: which is outside the prescribed limits obviously effecting safe control of the vehicle.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: sydd y tu allan i'r terfynau rhagnodedig yn amlwg yn effeithio ar reolaeth ddiogel y cerbyd.

items.itemDescription: Set Speed marked on Speed Limiter Plate greater than:
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Gosod Cyflymder wedi'i farcio ar Blât Cyfyngu Cyflymder sy'n fwy na:

deficiencies.deficiencyText: 90km/h (56 mph) for a vehicle described in Application section Groups A, C, D, E & F.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: 90km/a (56 mya) ar gyfer cerbyd a ddisgrifir yn adran Cais Grwpiau A, C, D, E & F.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: 96.5 km/h (60 mph) for a vehicle described in Application section Group B.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: 96.5km/a (60 mya) ar gyfer cerbyd a ddisgrifir yn adran Cais Grwp B.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: missing.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ar goll.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: insecure.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: yn anniogel.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: not in a conspicuous position.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ddim mewn safle amlwg.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: not clearly and indelibly marked with the set speed.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: heb ei farcio'n glir ac yn annileadwy gyda'r cyflymder gosod.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: not fitted or obviously inoperative.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: heb ei ffitio neu'n amlwg yn anweithredol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: insecure.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: yn anniogel.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: actuating rods/cables disconnected or damaged so that the operation is obviously affected.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: rhodenni/ceblau actio wedi'u datgysylltu neu eu difrodi fel ei fod yn amlwg yn effeithio ar y weithred.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: missing.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: so insecure that it might fall away partially or completely when the vehicle is in use.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: leaking.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: incorrectly positioned so that fumes are likely to enter the driver’s cab and/or passenger compartment.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: positioned so that fumes are entering the driver’s cab and/or passenger compartment.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: any abnormal movement in a joint to such an extent that separation is likely.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: unrhyw symudiad annormal mewn cymal i'r fath raddau fel bod gwahaniad yn debygol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: movement between sector shaft and drop arm.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: symudiad rhwng siafft sector a braich gollwng.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: movement between sector shaft and drop arm to such an extent that separation is likely.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: symudiad rhwng siafft sector a braich gollwng i'r fath raddau fel bod gwahanu yn debygol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: excessive wear in a pivot point (e.g. an intermediate drop arm).
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: traul gormodol mewn pwynt colyn (e.e. braich gollwng canolradd).

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a component fixed to the chassis insecure.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: cydran sydd wedi'i osod ar y siasi yn ansefydlog.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a component fixed to the chassis insecure to such an extent that separation is likely.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: cydran sydd wedi'i osod ar y siasi yn anniogel i'r fath raddau fel bod gwahaniad yn debygol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: movement between a steering arm and its fixings.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: symudiad rhwng braich llywio a'i gosodiadau.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: movement between a steering arm and its fixings to such an extent that separation is likely.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: symudiad rhwng braich llywio a'i gosodiadau i'r fath raddau fel bod gwahaniad yn debygol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a component fractured or so cracked, damaged, misaligned, deformed or so worn that it is likely to fail.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: cydran sydd wedi torri neu wedi cracio cymaint, wedi'i difrodi, wedi'i cham-alinio, wedi'i dadffurfio neu wedi treulio cymaint fel ei fod yn debygol o fethu.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a retaining or locking device ineffective, not fitted or insecure.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: dyfais cadw neu gloi yn aneffeithiol, heb ei ffitio neu'n ansefydlog.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a steering lock stop missing, insecure or not fulfilling its function.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: stop clo llywio ar goll, yn ansefydlog neu ddim yn cyflawni ei swyddogaeth.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a component repaired by welding and or showing signs of excessive heat being applied.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: cydran wedi'i thrwsio trwy weldio a/neu sy'n dangos arwyddion o wres gormodol yn cael ei roi.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a component repaired by welding and or showing signs of excessive heat being applied, which obviously affects the steering control.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: cydran wedi'i thrwsio trwy weldio a/neu sy'n dangos arwyddion o wres gormodol yn cael ei roi, sy'n amlwg yn effeithio ar y rheolaeth llywio.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: any steering component, road wheel or tyre fouling any part of the vehicle.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: unrhyw gydran llywio, olwyn ffordd neu faw teiars unrhyw ran o'r cerbyd.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: track rod excessively deformed.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: rhod trac yn anffurfio'n ormodol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: track rod excessively deformed and obviously affects steering control.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: rhod trac yn anffurfio'n ormodol ac yn amlwg yn effeithio ar reolaeth llywio.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: roughness or undue stiffness in the operation of the steering.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: garwedd neu anystwythder gormodol yng ngweithrediad y llywio.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: excessive lift or end float of a sector shaft.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: lifft gormodol neu arnofio diwedd siafft sector.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: excessive lift or end float of a sector shaft to such an extent that functionality is affected.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: lifft gormodol neu arnofio diwedd siafft sector i'r fath raddau fel yr effeithir ar ymarferoldeb.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: excessive wear in the steering rack.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: traul gormodol yn y rac llywio.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: excessive wear in the steering rack to such an extent that functionality is obviously affected.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: traul gormodol yn y rac llywio i'r fath raddau fel bod ymarferoldeb yn amlwg yn cael ei effeithio.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: excessive movement of rack housing in mounting bushes.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: symudiad gormodol o dai rac mewn llwyni mowntio.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: excessive movement of rack housing in mounting bushes to such an extent that steering control is obviously affected.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: symudiad gormodol o dai rac mewn llwyni mowntio i'r fath raddau fel ei fod yn amlwg yn effeithio ar reolaeth llywio.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a rack gaiter (if rack originally fitted with gaiters) split, damaged, missing or displaced.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: coesarn rac (os oedd rac wedi'i ffitio'n wreiddiol â choesarnau) wedi hollti, difrodi, ar goll neu wedi'i ddadleoli.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a ball joint cover damaged or deteriorated but not to the extent that it would no longer prevent the ingress of dirt etc.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gorchudd cymal siâp pêl wedi'i ddifrodi neu wedi dirywio ond nid i'r graddau na fyddai bellach yn atal baw rhag mynd i mewn ac ati.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a ball joint cover missing, insecure, excessively damaged or severely deteriorated to the extent that it would no longer prevent the ingress of dirt etc.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gorchudd cymal siâp pêl ar goll, yn ansefydlog, wedi'i ddifrodi'n ormodol neu wedi dirywio'n ddifrifol i'r graddau na fyddai bellach yn atal baw rhag mynd i mewn ac ati.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: leak of oil or grease.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gollyngiad o olew neu saim.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: gear casing fractured.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: casin gêr wedi torri.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: gear casing fractured and obviously affects steering control or the casing is likely to become detached.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: casin gêr wedi torri ac yn amlwg yn effeithio ar reolaeth llywio neu mae'r casin yn debygol o ddatgysylltu.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with a system component with an inappropriate modification.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda chydran system ag addasiad amhriodol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a system component with an unsafe modification which has seriously weakened the component, does not provide sufficient clearance to other vehicle parts or renders the steering component inoperative.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: nid yw cydran system ag addasiad anniogel sydd wedi gwanhau'r gydran yn ddifrifol, yn darparu cliriad digonol i rannau eraill o'r cerbyd neu'n gwneud y gydran llywio yn anweithredol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a missing or insecure propshaft flange bolt.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: bollt fflans siafft yrru ar goll neu'n ansefydlog.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: insecure or missing propshaft flange bolts to such an extent that detachment is likely.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: bolltau fflans siafft yrru ansefydlog neu ar goll i'r fath raddau fel bod datodiad yn debygol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: any flange cracked or insecure.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: unrhyw fflans wedi cracio neu'n ansefydlog.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: any flange cracked or insecure to such an extent that detachment is likely.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: unrhyw fflans wedi cracio neu'n ansefydlog i'r fath raddau fel bod datgysylltiad yn debygol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: excessive wear in a shaft bearing.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gwisgo gormodol mewn siafft dwyn.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: excessive wear in a shaft bearing to such an extent that detachment is likely.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: traul gormodol mewn siafft dwyn i'r fath raddau fel bod datodiad yn debygol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a bearing housing insecure, cracked or fractured.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: beryn amgaead yn ansefydlog, wedi cracio neu wedi torri.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a bearing housing insecure, cracked or fractured to such an extent that detachment is likely.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: beryn amgaead sy'n anniogel, wedi cracio neu wedi torri i'r fath raddau fel bod datgysylltiad yn debygol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: excessive wear in a universal joint.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: traul gormodol mewn cymal cyffredinol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: excessive wear in a universal joint to such an extent that detachment is likely.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: traul gormodol mewn cymal cyffredinol i'r fath raddau fel bod datgysylltiad yn debygol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: deterioration of a flexible coupling.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: dirywiad cyplydd hyblyg.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: deterioration of a flexible coupling such that failure is imminent.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: dirywiad cyplydd hyblyg fel bod methiant ar fin digwydd.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a seriously damaged, cracked or bent shaft or a shaft which is fouling on other components.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: siafft sydd wedi'i ddifrodi'n ddifrifol, wedi cracio neu'n plygu neu siafft sy'n baeddu ar gydrannau eraill.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: deterioration, fracture or insecurity of a bearing housing flexible mounting.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: dirywiad, torasgwrn neu ansicrwydd cludyn sy'n cynnwys mowntin hyblyg.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: deterioration, fracture or insecurity of a bearing housing flexible mounting such that failure is imminent.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: dirywiad, torasgwrn neu ansicrwydd cludyn sy'n cynnwys mowntin hyblyg fel bod methiant ar fin digwydd.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a constant velocity or universal joint excessively worn or insecure.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: cyflymder cyson neu gymal cyffredinol wedi treulio'n ormodol neu'n ansefydlog.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a constant velocity or universal joint excessively worn or insecure to such an extent that failure is imminent.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: cyflymder cyson neu gymal cyffredinol wedi treulio'n ormodol neu'n ansefydlog i'r fath raddau fel bod methiant ar fin digwydd.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a flexible coupling severely cracked, softened or breaking up.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: cyplydd hyblyg wedi cracio, meddalu neu dorri'n ddifrifol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a flexible coupling severely cracked, softened or breaking up such that failure is imminent.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: cyplydd hyblyg wedi cracio, meddalu neu dorri'n ddifrifol fel bod methiant ar fin digwydd.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a constant velocity gaiter insecure, damaged or deteriorated but not to the extent that it would no longer prevent the ingress of dirt etc.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: coesarn cyflymder cyson yn ansefydlog, wedi'i ddifrodi neu wedi dirywio ond nid i'r graddau na fyddai bellach yn atal baw rhag mynd i mewn ac ati.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a constant velocity gaiter missing, insecure, excessively damaged or severely deteriorated to the extent that it would no longer prevent the ingress of dirt etc.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: coesarn cyflymder cyson ar goll, yn ansefydlog, wedi'i niweidio'n ormodol neu wedi dirywio'n ddifrifol i'r graddau na fyddai bellach yn atal baw rhag mynd i mewn ac ati.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: missing when known to be a mandatory item.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ar goll pan yn gwybod ei fod yn eitem orfodol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: components missing, insecure, or damaged.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: cydrannau ar goll, yn ansefydlog, neu wedi'u difrodi.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: components missing, insecure, or damaged to such an extent the device is inoperative.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: cydrannau ar goll, yn ansefydlog, neu wedi'u difrodi i'r fath raddau bod y ddyfais yn anweithredol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: wiring insecure or damaged to such an extent the device is inoperative.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gwifrau'n ansefydlog, neu wedi'u difrodi i'r fath raddau bod y ddyfais yn anweithredol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with inadequate clearance with other components.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda chlirio annigonol gyda chydrannau eraill

deficiencies.deficiencyText: heat shield missing.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: tarian gwres ar goll.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: component or its surroundings overheating.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gydran neu ei amgylchoedd yn gorboethi.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with exhaust gas or oil leaks from the device.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda nwy gwacáu neu olew yn gollwng o'r ddyfais.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: modification to any part of the braking system.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: addasu unrhyw ran o'r system frecio.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: modification to any part of the braking system and braking performance is affected.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: addasiad i unrhyw ran o'r system frecio ac effeithir ar berfformiad brecio.

items.itemDescription: A brake rod, clevis joint, linkage, relay, lever, pin, pivot, slack adjuster or cable:
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Rhod brêc, uniad clevis, cyswllt, relái, lifer, pin, colyn, addasydd slac neu gebl:

deficiencies.deficiencyText: seriously weakened by excessive wear, corrosion, damage or reduced in diameter by more than the prescribed limit.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: wedi'i wanhau'n ddifrifol gan draul gormodol, cyrydiad, difrod neu wedi'i leihau mewn diamedr gan fwy na'r terfyn rhagnodedig.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with abnormal movement indicating incorrect adjustment , or excessive radial free play.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda symudiad annormal yn dynodi addasiad anghywir, neu chwarae rhydd rheiddiol gormodol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with an ineffective, insecure or missing locking device.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda dyfais gloi aneffeithiol, ansefydlog neu ar goll.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a brake cable knotted, or with more wires broken than permitted by the specified standard.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: cebl brêc wedi'i glymu, neu gyda mwy o wifrau wedi'u torri nag a ganiateir gan y safon benodedig.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a brake cable knotted, or with more wires broken than permitted by the specified standard which obviously affects the braking performance.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: cebl brêc wedi'i glymu, neu gyda mwy o wifrau wedi'u torri nag a ganiateir gan y safon benodedig sy'n amlwg yn effeithio ar y perfformiad brecio.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: cable guide is defective.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: canllaw cebl yn ddiffygiol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: automatic slack adjuster component incorrectly installed, missing, disconnected, insecure, distorted, fractured or inoperative.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: cydran aseswr slac awtomatig wedi'i osod yn anghywir, ar goll, wedi'i datgysylltu, yn ansefydlog, wedi'i ystumio, wedi torri neu'n anweithredol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: mandatory automatic slack adjuster not fitted.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: addasydd slac awtomatig gorfodol heb ei osod.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a brake fitted with an automatic slack adjuster exceeding two- thirds of the travel of the brake actuator, or obviously having a different travel from another brake on the same axle, or not returning fully when brakes are released.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: brêc wedi'i ffitio ag addasydd slac awtomatig sy'n fwy na dwy ran o dair o deithio'r ysgogi brêc, neu'n amlwg yn teithio'n wahanol i frêc arall ar yr un echel, neu ddim yn dychwelyd yn llawn pan ryddheir y breciau.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: misplaced and fouled or chafed by moving parts, with no obvious damage evident.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: wedi'i gamleoli a'i faeddu neu'n rhuthro gan rannau symudol, heb unrhyw ddifrod amlwg i'w weld.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: misplaced and fouled or chafed by moving parts with obvious signs of damage.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: wedi'u camleoli a'u baeddu neu eu rhuthro gan rannau symudol gydag arwyddion amlwg o ddifrod.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: chafed, cracked with no reinforcement cords exposed, corroded, stretched or twisted.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: wedi'i siapio, wedi cracio heb unrhyw gortynnau atgyfnerthu wedi'u hamlygu, wedi cyrydu, wedi'u hymestyn neu wedi'u troelli.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: excessively chafed, cracked with reinforcement cords exposed, excessively corroded, deteriorated, leaking, bulging, kinked, stretched or twisted and damage evident.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: wedi'u ruthro'n ormodol, wedi cracio â chortynnau atgyfnerthu wedi'u hamlygu, wedi cyrydu'n ormodol, wedi dirywio, yn gollwng, yn chwyddo, wedi'u tincian, wedi'u hymestyn neu'n troi a difrod yn amlwg.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: excessively chafed, cracked with reinforcement cords exposed and damaged, excessively corroded, deteriorated, leaking, bulging, kinked, stretched or twisted and in such a condition that risk of failure is imminent.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: wedi'u ruthro'n ormodol, wedi cracio â chortynnau atgyfnerthu wedi'u hamlygu a'u difrodi, wedi cyrydu'n ormodol, wedi dirywio, yn gollwng, yn chwyddo, wedi'u tincian, wedi'u hymestyn neu'n troi ac mewn cyflwr sy'n golygu bod risg o fethiant ar fin digwydd.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: inadequately clipped or otherwise inadequately supported.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: wedi'i glipio'n annigonol neu fel arall heb ei gefnogi'n ddigonol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: inadequately repaired or with unsuitable joint fittings.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: heb eu hatgyweirio'n ddigonol neu gyda ffitiadau anaddas ar y cyd.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: non-metallic pipe(s) exposed to excessive heat.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: pibell(au) anfetelaidd sy'n agored i wres gormodol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: leaking air from a pipe or connection.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: aer yn gollwng o bibell neu gysylltiad.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: leaking hydraulic fluid from a pipe or connection.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: hylif hydrolig yn gollwng o bibell neu gysylltiad.

items.itemDescription: Brake drums, back plates & shoes, discs, callipers & pads including friction material with:
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Drymiau brêc, platiau cefn ac esgidiau, disgiau, calipers a phadiau gan gynnwys deunydd ffrithiant gyda:

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a brake disc or drum excessively worn, or a brake disc cracked.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: disg brêc neu ddrwm wedi treulio'n ormodol, neu ddisg brêc wedi cracio.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a brake back plate, disc or drum in such a condition that it is seriously weakened, fractured or insecure.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: plât cefn brêc, disg neu drwm yn y fath gyflwr fel ei fod wedi'i wanhau'n ddifrifol, wedi torri neu'n ansefydlog.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a brake back plate or calliper securing bolt loose or missing.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: plât cefn brêc neu galiper yn dal bollt yn rhydd neu ar goll.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a brake back plate or calliper securing bolt loose or missing to such an extent the back plate or calliper is insecure.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: plât cefn brêc neu galiper yn dal bollt yn rhydd neu ar goll i'r fath raddau mae'r plât cefn neu'r caliper yn ansefydlog.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a brake, lining or pad less than 1.5mm thick at any point.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: brêc, leinin neu bad llai na 1.5mm o drwch ar unrhyw adeg.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a brake, lining or pad, missing, incorrectly fitted, insecure or with the lining/pad no longer visible.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: brêc, leinin neu bad, ar goll, wedi'i osod yn anghywir, yn anniogel neu nad yw'r leinin/pad yn weladwy rhagor.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: restricted movement of a brake component.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: symudiad cyfyngedig cydran brêc.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a brake drum, disc, lining or pad contaminated by oil or grease.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: drwm brêc, disg, leinin neu bad wedi'i halogi gan olew neu saim.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a brake drum, disc, lining or pad contaminated by oil or grease with the brake performance obviously affected.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: drwm brêc, disg, leinin neu bad wedi'i halogi gan olew neu saim gyda pherfformiad y brêc yn amlwg yn cael ei effeithio.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: defective in operation.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: diffygiol ar waith.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: modification to any part of the braking system.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: addasu unrhyw ran o'r system frecio.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: unsafe modification to any part of the braking system and braking performance is affected.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: addasiad anniogel i unrhyw ran o'r system frecio ac effeithir ar berfformiad brecio.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: lightly corroded
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: wedi cyrydu'n ysgafn

deficiencies.deficiencyText: insecure, excessively corroded, or leaking.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ansefydlog, wedi cyrydu'n ormodol, neu'n gollwng.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with damage or dents that do not significantly reduce the capacity.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda difrod neu dolciau nad ydynt yn lleihau'r cynhwysedd yn sylweddol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with damage or dents that obviously significantly reduce the capacity.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda difrod neu dolciau sy'n amlwg yn lleihau'r cynhwysedd yn sylweddol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with a securing strap fractured, cracked, excessively corroded or chafing on the reservoir or other mounting.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda strap diogelu wedi'i dorri, wedi cracio, wedi rhydu'n ormodol neu'n rhuthro ar y gronfa ddŵr neu fowntiad arall.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: missing where it is known to be a standard fitting.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ar goll lle gwyddys ei fod yn ffitiad safonol.

items.itemDescription: Actuators, hydraulic master & wheel cylinders, valves and servos:
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Ysgogiadau, meistr hydrolig a silindrau olwyn, falfiau a serfos:

deficiencies.deficiencyText: defective in operation.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: diffygiol ar waith.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: defective in operation and brake performance affected.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: diffygiol o ran gweithrediad ac effeithir ar berfformiad brêc.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: insecure but still operational.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: ansefydlog ond yn dal yn weithredol.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: insecure and brake performance affected.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: anniogel a pherfformiad brêc yr effeithir arnynt.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: leaking air or fluid, fractured, cracked, excessively damaged or corroded.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: aer neu hylif yn gollwng, wedi torri, wedi cracio, wedi'i ddifrodi'n ormodol neu wedi cyrydu.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: leaking air or fluid, fractured, cracked, excessively damaged or corroded and brake performance is affected.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: aer neu hylif yn gollwng, wedi torri, wedi cracio, wedi'i ddifrodi'n ormodol neu wedi cyrydu ac mae perfformiad brêc yn cael ei effeithio.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with a locking device missing or insecure.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda dyfais gloi ar goll neu'n ansicr.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with insufficient or excessive travel of operating mechanism indicating a need for adjustment.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda theithio annigonol neu ormodol o fecanwaith gweithredu sy'n dangos bod angen addasu.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with insufficient or excessive travel of operating mechanism indicating a need for adjustment and brake performance is affected.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gyda theithio annigonol neu ormodol o fecanwaith gweithredu sy'n dangos bod angen addasu a pherfformiad brêc yn cael ei effeithio.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with a cap missing from a hydraulic master cylinder and/or fluid obviously contaminated.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: fluid below minimum level or level warning device defective/activated.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: fluid significantly below minimum level.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: no visible fluid.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: with a valve with excessive discharge of oil.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a load sensing valve removed or disconnected when it is known to be a standard fitment.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a load sensing valve obviously seized or restricted in its free movement, linkage or brackets cracked, defective or out of adjustment (ABS functioning).
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: falf synhwyro llwyth yn amlwg wedi'i atafaelu neu ei gyfyngu o ran ei symudiad rhydd, cysylltiad neu fracedi wedi cracio, yn ddiffygiol neu allan o addasiad (swyddogaeth ABS).

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a load sensing valve obviously seized or restricted in its free movement, linkage or brackets cracked, defective or out of adjustment. (No ABS function).
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: falf synhwyro llwyth yn amlwg wedi'i atafaelu neu ei gyfyngu o ran ei symudiad rhydd, cysylltiad neu fracedi wedi cracio, yn ddiffygiol neu allan o addasiad. (Dim swyddogaeth ABS).

deficiencies.deficiencyText: hydraulic brake actuator dust cover damaged or deteriorated but not to the extent that it would no longer prevent the ingress of dirt etc.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gorchudd llwch ysgogi brêc hydrolig wedi'i ddifrodi neu wedi dirywio ond nid i'r graddau na fyddai bellach yn atal baw rhag mynd i mewn ac ati.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: hydraulic brake actuator dust cover missing, insecure, excessively damaged or severely deteriorated to the extent that it would no longer prevent the ingress of dirt etc.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: gorchudd llwch ysgogi brêc hydrolig ar goll, yn ansefydlog, wedi'i ddifrodi'n ormodol neu wedi dirywio'n ddifrifol i'r graddau na fyddai bellach yn atal baw rhag mynd i mewn ac ati.

deficiencies.deficiencyText: a compressor drive pulley loose, cracked or missing.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: pwli gyriant cywasgwr yn rhydd, wedi cracio neu ar goll.

deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: dyfais glanhau anweithredol ar gyfer systemau LED neu ollwng nwy (HID).
